title: Inside Out
short_plot_summary: A young girl named Riley experiences a range of emotions as she adjusts to her new life in San Francisco, and her emotions - Joy, Sadness, Anger, Fear, and Disgust - help her navigate the challenges.
explanation: A smiling face, representing Joy, one of the main characters and emotions in the movie
A crying face, symbolizing Sadness, another main character and emotion in the story
An angry face, illustrating Anger, one of the important emotions guiding Riley's actions
A fearful face, signifying Fear, another emotion that influences Riley's decisions
A face with a mask, representing Disgust, an emotion that helps Riley make choices about her likes and dislikes
